mapper.insert:
insert into tb_manpower_social_security ( id, job_number, salary_bank, salary_number, provident_fund_account, provident_fund_payment, social_security_account, social_security_payment ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.jobNumber}, #{item.salaryBank}, #{item.salaryNumber}, #{item.providentFundAccount}, #{item.providentFundPayment}, #{item.socialSecurityAccount}, #{item.socialSecurityPayment} )
